conduits.name: Stalwart Guardian
conduits.description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Arms</spec>
<dynamic>Die by the Sword</dynamic>

<spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Enraged Regeneration</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Shield Wall</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>20 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Brutal Vitality
conduits.description: <dynamic>6.0%</dynamic> of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

conduits.name: Inspiring Presence
conduits.description: Rallying Cry's duration and health granted are increased by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Safeguard
conduits.description: Intervene reduces damage taken by the target by <dynamic>10%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Iron Maiden
conduits.description:
<spec>Arms</spec><spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Slam</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Revenge</dynamic>

 has a <dynamic>4.0%</dynamic> chance to refund a charge of Shield Block.

conduits.name: Ashen Juggernaut
conduits.description: Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 3% for 8 sec, stacking up to <dynamic>6</dynamic> times.

conduits.name: Crash the Ramparts
conduits.description: Overpower has a <dynamic>6.0%</dynamic> chance to apply Colossus Smash for 3 sec.

conduits.name: Cacophonous Roar
conduits.description: Intimidating Shout can withstand <dynamic>80%</dynamic> more damage before breaking.

conduits.name: Merciless Bonegrinder
conduits.description:
Slam critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm by <dynamic>1.0 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Indelible Victory
conduits.description:
<condition>Impending Victory</condition>
<dynamic>Impending Victory</dynamic>

Victory Rush heals you for <dynamic>400%</dynamic> of the damage it dealt over 8 sec.

conduits.name: Unnerving Focus
conduits.description: Last Stand increases your Rage generation by <dynamic>30%.</dynamic>

conduits.name: Hack and Slash
conduits.description: Rampage has a <dynamic>10.0%</dynamic> chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.

conduits.name: Vicious Contempt
conduits.description: Bloodthirst deals <dynamic>40%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies who are below 20% health.

conduits.name: Piercing Verdict
conduits.description: Spear of Bastion's instant damage and Rage generation are increased by <dynamic>20%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Veteran's Repute
conduits.description: Brandishing the Conqueror's Banner immediately grants you 5 Glory, and while the banner is planted your Strength is increased by <dynamic>12%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Harrowing Punishment
conduits.description: Condemn's damage dealt and prevented are increased by <dynamic>8%</dynamic> for each nearby enemy, up to <dynamic>40%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Mortal Combo
conduits.description: Mortal Strike has a <dynamic>15%</dynamic> chance to hit an additional time.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Spear of Bastion
covenants.description:
Throw a Kyrian spear at the target location, dealing (200% of Attack power) Arcane damage instantly and an additional (216% of Attack power) damage over 4 sec. 

Enemies hit are tethered to Spear of Bastion's location for the duration.

<dynamic>Generates 25 Rage.</dynamic>

covenants.name: Ancient Aftershock
covenants.description:
Slam the ground with your weapon, releasing a shockwave dealing (220% of Attack power) Nature damage and stunning up to 5 enemies for 1.5 sec.

Enemies struck take (42% of Attack power) Nature damage every 2 sec for 12 sec and transfer it to you as 6 Rage.

covenants.name: Conqueror's Banner
covenants.description:
Brandish the banner of the Necrolords for 2 min, increasing your movement speed by 10% and causing 

<spec>Arms</spec>
<dynamic>Mortal Strike</dynamic>

<spec>Fury</spec>
<dynamic>Raging Blow</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Shield Slam</dynamic>


<dynamic>one of your abilities</dynamic>

 to grant you <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>. Killing an enemy grants 2 stacks of <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>.

Reactivating this ability plants the banner in the ground, granting 20% maximum health and 50% attack speed to you and 4 allies within 15 yds of the banner. Lasts 2 sec per <dynamic>Glory</dynamic>, up to 30 sec.

covenants.name: Condemn
covenants.description:
Condemn a foe to suffer for their sins, causing up to [2.0 * (92.2% of Attack power)] Shadow damage. Only usable on enemies who are above 80% health or below 20% health.

The primary target is weakened, preventing up to [(0.6 * Attack power) * 2.0 * (1 + Versatility)] damage they would deal to you.

<spec>Arms</spec><spec>Protection (Level 18)</spec>
<dynamic>If your foe survives, 20% of the Rage spent is refunded</dynamic>

legendaries.name: Thunderlord
legendaries.description: Each enemy you hit with Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 3 sec.

legendaries.name: The Wall
legendaries.description: Shield Slam generates an additional 2 Rage and reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 4 sec.

legendaries.name: Misshapen Mirror
legendaries.description: Spell Reflection lasts 200% longer, and applies to your party.

legendaries.name: Signet of Tormented Kings
legendaries.description:
Activating 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

legendaries.name: Battlelord
legendaries.description: Your Slam has a 30% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike.

legendaries.name: Unhinged
legendaries.description:
While 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>Ravager</dynamic>

Bladestorm is active, you automatically cast a total of 

<condition>Ravager</condition>
<dynamic>1</dynamic>

2 Mortal Strikes at random nearby enemies.

legendaries.name: Exploiter
legendaries.description: Execute causes the target to take 25% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.

legendaries.name: Enduring Blow
legendaries.description: Your Mortal Strike has a 15% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 5 sec.

legendaries.name: Cadence of Fujieda
legendaries.description: Bloodthirst increases your Haste by 2% for 5 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

legendaries.name: Deathmaker
legendaries.description: Your Rampage has a 25% chance to apply the Siegebreaker effect to your target for 5 sec.

legendaries.name: Reckless Defense
legendaries.description: Rampage critical strikes reduce your Recklessness and Enraged Regeneration cooldown by 3 sec.

legendaries.name: Unbreakable Will
legendaries.description: Your Shield Wall ability now grants 50% of its effect to all party members.

legendaries.name: Reprisal
legendaries.description: The first Intercepted attack granst you Ignore Pain and make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

legendaries.name: Seismic Reverberation
legendaries.description:
If Whirlwind 

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>or Revenge</dynamic>

hits 3 or more enemies, it hits them 1 additional time.
